newsitem.title: FRANCE: Soc Gen has 5.11 pct of Peugeot voting rights.
newsitem.headline: Soc Gen has 5.11 pct of Peugeot voting rights.

text.p: French bank Societe Generale said it had breached the five percent disclosure threshold and now held 5.11 percent of the voting rights of carmaker Peugeot SA, French financial markets regulator Conseil des marches financiers (CMF) said on Wednesday.

CMF said in a statement the level had been breached after Societe Generale and its unit Delahaye Generale Options bought 55,220, or 0.38 percent, of the voting rights as part of their trading activities.
